item.title: El Salvador's Bukele after friendly White House meeting with Trump: 'I miss you already, President T'
item.description: El Salvador's President Nayib Bukele tweeted, "I miss you already, President T." The foreign leader met with U.S. President Donald Trump at the White ...

item.title: First Mexico-born rep targets indictment-plagued Democrat in House GOP comeback bid
item.description: Former Rep. Mayra Flores is launching a comeback bid, this time eyeing Rep. Henry Cuellar's seat in South Texas.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump from revoking legal status for 530,000+ migrants who flew into US via Biden program
item.description: The Trump administration is blocked from revoking the legal status of more than 500,000 migrants from certain countries by a federal judge.
